credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Frame
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Vertical rectangle. The inner frame has a cresting; in the center is a triangle with a vase crowned with flames, beside acroteria. The vase is encircled by a serpent, in the panel of the outer frame. Below, is a variation of the motif in 1938-88-1906; two trees, laterally. Dark background.
name: Drawing
